data.message:
Oh no Nitin! Please don’t be so sad, 
Coca-Cola Zero Sugar is the best we’ve ever had!
It’s much more like Coke Classic, and still bursting with flavour. 
It’s a drink that refreshes , with a taste to savour. 
We’re sorry you’re not a fan - that breaks our heart.
Perhaps you and Coca-Cola Zero Sugar just got off to the wrong start?
We would love you to give it another shot, 
Just give us your address (we kid you not).
We’ll send you some vouchers with the hope that this time
You and Coca-Cola Zero Sugar will be more than just fine!

replies.message: Love that you  offer this person vouchers to try the coke again yet i email about a bottle of lilt that me and 3 oghers were unable to open and yet as i had to throw away ( was out for day and not going to carry a full bottle of drink no one can open) you guys cant do anything. Dissappointed in coca cola customer service ! :-(
